name: You+Topia
description:
Think! Talk! Play!

You+Topia is a 2~3 player game that helps you to find out what you and your friends think about Utopia. Find out the words, share your opinions, listen what other people think to win the game!

- Each stage has a subject about your ideal place, think about the subject before the game starts.

- Choose 9 words from the serious of random words that you think best fit for the subject

- Write down the words on 3x3 grid paper on time.

(You should match color if your grid is colored)

- Play Bingo! Match the words that every player wrote in common.

- players should match 3 lines in total to clear the stage.
